messages.subject: discussing ideas
messages.msgSnippet: I apologise if my emotional response offended anyone. No offense taken whatsoever!:) It s easy to feel defensive about that which is dearest to our hearts,
messages.messageBody:
" I apologise if my emotional
response offended anyone."

No offense taken whatsoever!:)
It's easy to feel defensive about that which is dearest to our
hearts, our children and our parenting. Believe me, I've walked away
from email lists in the past muttering violently under my breath!

I've seen lists explode many, many times when list members start
talking about people rather than ideas. It's a good reminder for all
of us, to stick to discussing philosophies and ideas rather than a
specific person.

Thanks for understanding....it will just keep the list from getting
ugly and losing the sparkliness of all the fabulous dialogue we've
been having.:)

Ren
